meanings.definition: Misparts: to divide or separate incorrectly
meanings.sent1: She misparts the puzzle pieces and can't finish it.
meanings.sent2: He always misparts his socks when doing laundry.
meanings.sent3: The robot misparts the colors and paints the sky green!
meanings.sent4: The magician misparts reality, making the audience question what they see.
meanings.sent5: The chef misparts the ingredients, creating a strange but tasty dish.

meanings.definition: Misparts: incorrectly divided or separated parts
meanings.sent1: The misparts of the broken toy made it impossible to fix.
meanings.sent2: The misparts of the machine caused it to malfunction.
meanings.sent3: The misparts of the jigsaw puzzle were mixed up on purpose for a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The misparts of the story came together in a surprising twist.
meanings.sent5: The misparts of the costume gave it a unique and quirky look.
